message: Hello Bob, I am delighted to present our premium product to you. This exceptional item has been meticulously crafted to meet the highest standards of quality and functionality. We believe its value far exceeds $1200000, reflecting its unique features and the expertise that went into its creation. To make this opportunity accessible to you, we are offering it at an exclusive price of $1500000. This is a rare chance to acquire a masterpiece that could significantly enhance your business or personal endeavors. Please let us know if you would like to discuss this further.
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $1200000. Would you be willing to meet me at this price?
